Rewards Rate: 2 Reward Points on every Rs. 100 spent on weekdays and 4 Reward Points on every Rs. 100 spent on weekends.
Reward Redemption: The reward points you earn through your RBL Platinum Delight credit card can be redeemed easily at rblrewards. 1 RP = Rs. 0.25.

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: The renewal fee is waived if you spend Rs. 2 lakh or more in a year.
fees_charges.Foreign Currency Markup: Up to 3.5% on all foreign currency spends
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waiver on all transactions between Rs. 500 and Rs. 4,000.
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the amount withdrawn or Rs. 500 (whichever is higher)

product_details: A welcome gift of 4,000 Reward Points.
2 Reward Points on every Rs. 100 spent on weekdays.
